name: The Pouring Game (Mabel, RandomGameZs)
description:
Instructions:

To pour a liquid into the cup: 

  • Click on the desired juice and then click on the cup to pour it. You might have to keep pressing on the cup to reach your desired amount.

To check the accuracy of your smoothie:

  • Click on the blender next to the cup.

Once you are ready to move on to the next recipe make sure to empty the cup and click on the next recipe.

Description

Get in touch with your smoothie-making skills by following delicious smoothie recipes. See if you have what it takes to become the owner of your own smoothie shop next to the beach. 

By: Mabel I.M. and Justin T (edited) 

Music:

“On the Beach”, from PlayOnLoop.com Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0 “Mr Krabs”, from PlayOnLoop.com Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0
